level.heading: GENERAL PROVISIONS AND APPLICABILITY (ยง 11-3301) The Saint Elizabeths East Campus (StE) District is a unique location districtreated to implement the public policy goal and objectives of the Comprehensivelan, the St. Elizabeths Redevelopment Framework Plan, as approved by theouncil of the District of Columbia on December 16, 2008, and the Saintlizabeths East Master Plan and Design Guidelines, June 4, 2012. The StE District shall apply to Lot 2 in Square S-5868, which comprises therea historically referred to as the Saint Elizabeths East Campus, and generallyounded by the Unified Communications Center to the north; open space and thet. Elizabeths Psychiatric Hospital the east; Alabama Avenue and the residentialommunity to the south; and Martin Luther King, Jr., Avenue to the west. The StE District shall constitute the Zoning Regulations for the geographicrea referred to in ยง 3301.2. Where there are conflicts between this chapternd other chapters of this title, the provisions of the StE District shallovern.
